name: ClassTime
description: ClassTime is a fun interactive game about a student looking at their phone in class. The player has to avoid the professors seeing them not paying attention in class. The player has to click and hold the mouse button to pull out their phone. While the phone is out the score will count and once the score reaches 50 they player will move on to the next level. If they are caught by the professors they lose and have to restart. There are 4 levels in this html game.
